1.「義賊のヤツらめ……。| なぜ このオレが あの偽善者どもに| 引けを とらなき: You righteous bastards... why should I give in|to those hypocrites?

2.「オレが 間違ってるっていうのか！？| 答えろよ ギャスモン！: Are you saying I'm wrong? Answer me, Gasmon!

3.「答エナド 必要ナイ。| 汝ハ 求メレバ 得ラレルノダ。| ソノ欲望コソガ 汝ノ: There is no need for an answer. You seek and|you shall find. Sono desire is your ability...

4.「へへっ そうか。それじゃあ| 今よりも 強い魔物を操るチカラをくれ！| 旅団を: Heh, I see. Then give me the power to control|monsters stronger than ever! I'll make the|brigade even bigger!

5.「マタ 魔物ヲ 操ルちからカ……。| ソロソロ 汝自身 強クナル| 必要ガ アル: You have the power to control monsters... but|you need to be strong yourself, Squid. I don't|know...?

6.「ソノ手デ 憎シミヲ 断ツタメニ……。: Sono, to cut off the hatred with your hands...

7.「ホウラ……。ソノコトヲ告ゲル| 使者ガ 来タヨウダ……。: Sono... a messenger came to tell you that...

8.「何しにきやがった。| オレを 正しい道に進ませようとか| ふざけたこと 考えて: What are you doing here? I hope you're not|thinking of setting me on the right path.

9.「チッ！ 親父と同じ 偽善者の目……。| その目を見てると むしずが走るぜ！|:
Damn! You have the same hypocritical eyes as|my father... and I can feel a twinge in my gut|when I look into them! Do you know what you|
|did to my father?

10.「ムーチョが 町長の家に盗みに入った日……| オレの母さんは 生死の境を さまよ: The day Mucho robbed the mayor's house my|mother was on the verge of death. After years|of illness.

11.「うちは 貧乏でよ。薬を買う金もなかった……。| そんなとき 町長の財宝を持った: We were poor. We didn't have money to buy|medicine... then Mucho came to our house with|the mayor's treasure. I did a little dance!

12.「……けどよ！ ムーチョは……| 親父は 母さんの まくらもとに立っても| 何も: But... but! Mucho... my father stood at Mom's|bedside and left without leaving anything|behind!

13.「次の日に 母さんは 死んだよ。| 親父は泣いてたが 今思えば あのときの涙も|: Mom died the next day. Dad was crying, but|looking back now, I'm sure his tears were just|a few inches long.

14.「オレは ムーチョへの復讐を誓い 家を出た。| ……そして ここにいるギャスモン: I left home, swearing revenge on Mucho. And|then I met Gasmon here and received the power|to control monsters!

15.「盗賊なんて しょせん悪党……。| そのことを 世間に教えてやるために| つむじ: Thieves are just villains... and that's why I|formed the Whirlwind Brigade, to teach the|world that!

16.「でもよ…… もう つむじ風の旅団なんて| まわりくどいことは やめるぜ。| オ: But I'm not going to be a part of the|Whirlwind Brigade anymore. I'm going to kill|you all myself!

17.「ギャスモン！ さあ オレにチカラをくれ！| こいつらを ひねりつぶすための|: Gasmon! Come on, give me the power! Give me|the power to crush them!

18.「スベテハ 欲望ノ オモムクママニ……。: I want to be a part of your life...

19.「おお…… みなぎる みなぎるぞ！！！| 黒いチカラが オレの身体に………ッ！！: Oh, it's coming, it's coming, it's coming,|it's coming! The black power of my body!

21.「ブルルルルッ！| すべての義賊に 死を……！| 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ！！: Brrrrrrr! Death to all the bandits! Death...|death...!

22.「ブルルルルッ！！ 何度来ても同じこと！| 貴様ら 義賊は オレには勝てん！！|:
Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!!!! I keep coming|back and I keep getting the same thing! You|righteous bastards are no match for me! I'm|
|the one who's right!

23.「ブルルルルッ！| すべての義賊に 死を……！| 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ！！: Brrrrrrr! Death to all the bandits! Death...|death...!

24.「ブ…ブルルルル……。| 憎しみに身をまかせ チカラを得た| このオレが なぜ: I, who have been empowered by my hatred, how|did I become a righteous bandit...

25.「憎しみが 足りないのか……？| 義賊を…… 親父を 憎む心が……。: Not enough hatred for...? Hate for the|bandit... hate for my father...

26.「この バカ息子ーーーーー！！！: You stupid son of a bitch!

27.「アンタは 母親の思いを 踏みにじる気かい！！| 妻を救えなかった 親父さんの気:
You're trying to trample on your mother's|feelings! Have you ever given a thought to how|your father felt when he couldn't save his|
|wife?

28.「アンタの親父さんね このままじゃいけないって| あたいに 真相を話してくれたよ: Your father told me the truth because he|didn't want things to go on like this. You,|too, listen with your ears open!

29.「……町長の家に盗みに入った あの日| ワシは お前の母を 助けられるだけのカネ: That day I robbed the mayor's house, I was|going to leave enough money to help your|mother.

31.「私たちの約束を 忘れたのですか……。| そう言って カネを置いていくことを|: He was very anxious to leave the money behind.

32.「約束……？| 約束って なんだよ……？: Promise...? What do you mean by promise...?

33.「ワシが ムーチョになると決めたとき| 妻は いっさいの盗品を 自分たちのために: When I decided to become a moochie, my wife|asked me to promise not to use any of the|stolen goods for ourselves.

34.「盗んだものを 少しでも 自分たちのために| 使ってしまえば それは義賊ではなく: He told them that if they used even a little|of what they had stolen for themselves, they|were not righteous thieves, but mere slobs.

35.「そして 私利私欲のために 動くのではなく| 人のために尽くすことを 固く誓い|: And so, with a firm vow to serve others and|not for personal gain, I became Mucho...

36.「ねえ チャムール。| ふたりの心意気……。| アンタには もう わからないのか: Hey, Chamour. Don't you know what it's like to|be you two?

37.「この オルゴールの音色を聞いても| 母親の優しさを 思いだせなかったのかい？: Did the sound of this Music Box not remind you|of your mother's kindness?

40.「憎シミノ心ガ 消エタ……。| コノ器ハ 使エヌ。欲望ガ足リヌ……。: The heart of hatred is gone... the vessel|cannot be used. The desire is not enough...

42.「すまなかったなあ チャムール……。| もう お前を ひとりにはせん。| やり直: I'm sorry, Chamour... but I won't leave you|alone anymore. Let's start over. With me.

43.「……グスッ。ダメだね……。| あたい こういうのには 弱いんだ。: I can't do it... It's no good... I have a|weakness for this kind of thing.

44.「……さてと これにて 一件落着だね。| つむじ風の旅団も いなくなったし| ブ: Well, I guess that settles it. The Whirlwind|Brigade is gone, and the rancor between|Budecho and the others has dissipated.

45.「<cs_pchero> 今回も また大活躍だったね。| その礼をするからさ|: <cs_pchero> You did a great job again this|time. To thank you for that, please come to|Gatara's tavern.

46.「では ワシから 礼をさせてくれ。: Then allow me to thank you.

47.「<pc>よ。| お前には オルゴールの件や| 今回の件で 本当に 世話になった: <pc>. I really appreciate all the|help you've given me with Music Box and this|whole thing.

48.「その恩返しに 盗賊の必殺技を| お前に 伝授しよう。| さあ 目を つむるがよ: To repay the favor, I'll teach you a special|technique for thieves. Now, close your eyes.

50.「その恩返しに これを受け取ってくれ。| 大事に 使うんだぞ。: Take this to repay the favor. Take good care|of it.

51.「お前は 盗賊を極められる器だ。| 時が満ちたら ワシの所へ来るがいい。| もち: You are a master thief. Come to me when the|time is right. Of course, don't forget to be a|thief.

52.「とっておきの 試練を用意しといてやろう。| では またな。: I've prepared a trial for you. See you later.

53.「ブ…ブデチョのオッサン！| あ！ いや！ ムーチョ先生っ！！: B...Budecho's old man! Ah! No! Mr. Mucho!

54.「あたいを 弟子にしてくれないかい！？| あたい マスク・ド・ムーチョに あこが: Will you take me as your apprentice? I've|always wanted to be a Masc de Mucho, so I|jumped into this world! Please!

55.「すまんな。ワシは もう| 弟子は とらないことにしてるんだ。: I'm sorry. I've decided not to take on any|more apprentices.

56.「もう……ってことは| すでに お弟子さんが いるのかい！？: So... you already have a student?

57.「どこで ワシの正体を知ったのか| ちょっと前に 怪盗ポイなんとかって女の子が|: I don't know where she found out who I am, but|a little while ago, a girl called "Phantom|Thief Poi something" came to my place.

58.「もともと 弟子をとるつもりは なかったが| かわいい顔で 熱心に頼みこんできた: I had no intention of taking on an apprentice,|but when he asked so enthusiastically with his|cute face, I couldn't resist.

59.「ところが そのコ なかなか スジがよくて| 今は 彼女の指導で 手いっぱいなん:
However, this girl is pretty good at what she|does, and right now I've got my hands full|teaching her. That's why I'm sorry. Ha-ha-ha-|
|ha.
